institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 9 (City/Province Committee Secretariat)
contents: Article 9 (Secretariat of the City/Provincial Committee) ① In order to take charge of the affairs of the City/Provincial Committee as stipulated in Article 7, a secretariat shall be established in the establishment of the City/Provincial Committee and the Secretary General of the City/Provincial Committee (hereinafter referred to as the *City/Provincial Secretariat) (hereinafter referred to as the *City/Provincial Deputy Secretary General), Deputy Secretary General of the City/Provincial Committee (hereinafter referred to as *City/Provincial Deputy Secretary General), and staff in charge. Revised February 22, 2018, ② The city/provincial secretary general and the city/provincial deputy secretary general shall be determined by the city/provincial steering committee chairperson from among the employees of the skill competition business department of the corporation affiliated with the city/provincial committee. However, this does not apply when the chairperson of the city/provincial committee determines otherwise.
